artist: Larsen Design Studio Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Varying widths (1/4" - 3/8") strips of leather woven with cotton warp. Brown. This piece is the same as 99.1.1012.4 but without backing.  This piece is referred to as (Woven leather) on Larsen tag. (Smooth Hide, Rough Hide)
